headline: Assessing Gen Digital (GEN) Valuation After Recent Share Price Drift
summary: Gen Digital (GEN) shares have drifted about 7% lower over the past 3 months, closing most recently around $27.75. The stock's performance stands out in contrast to a backdrop of steady annual revenue and rising net income. See our latest analysis for Gen Digital. Despite a modest drift in Gen Digital’s share price over recent months, the longer view paints a more positive picture. The one-year total shareholder return sits at just over 3%, and there is a notable 42% return over three years...
